name: Smart Ass
description:
You play as a small and brave vacuum cleaner robot who wants to clean the whole house before it's owners arrival. But of course the stinky pets hate the newcomer and get in his way all the time. Use the help of other electrical devices connected via Internet of Things to distract these noisy animals. Don't let them catch you!

Goal: collect all mounds of dust 

Controls: use WASD to control the robot

Prototype created by Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine - Unreal Engine 4

Credits:

  • POLYGON - Town Pack by Synty Studios
  • A pile of sand3D Model by 3dhdscan
  • Stylized Low Poly German Shepherd3D Model by DreamNoms
  • Tuxedo Cat Animated3D Model by DreamNoms
